pl.bristleback.server.bristle.conf.resolver.init
Class PropertiesFileConfigResolver

java.lang.Object
  pl.bristleback.server.bristle.conf.resolver.init.PropertiesFileConfigResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
InitialConfigurationResolver
public class PropertiesFileConfigResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements InitialConfigurationResolver

This configuration resolver uses Properties file to retrieve configuration elements. Default values are taken from DefaultConfigurationResolver instance. The table below shows all properties:

Property Property key Property value type Default value
Server engine bristle.engine.name ServerEngine system.engine.jetty
Accepted data controllers bristle.websocket.controller DataController system.controller.action
User factory bristle.user.factory UserFactory DefaultUserFactory
Message dispatcher bristle.message.dispatcher MessageDispatcher system.dispatcher.multi.threaded
Serialization engine bristle.serialization.engine SerializationEngine system.serializer.json
Logging level bristle.logging.level Level DEBUG
Server Engine port bristle.engine.port Integer 8765
Server Engine timeout bristle.engine.timeout Integer 1000 * 60 * 5 milliseconds (5 minutes)
Server Engine maximum buffer size bristle.engine.max.buffer.size Integer 65536
Server Engine maximum message size bristle.engine.max.message.size Integer 65536

Created on: 2011-07-03 23:42:06

Author:
Wojciech Niemiec
